name: Puzzle Block Jewel
description:
Puzzle Block Jewels
From now on, let’s enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game! Once you start, you will be hooked. Drag the shape to fill the blank. A row or column full of blocks will be eliminated and you will get some scores. The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. The more cleared, the higher score you will obtain.

Game Features:
- Block puzzle
- Play easily and quickly
- Blocks can't be rotated
- Various blocks and colorful graphics
- Simple and attractive
- Casual puzzle game
- Funny sound effects
- No WIFI ? No problem!
- As the score increases, you will see more new elements.

Tips:
- No time limit
- Drag the Blocks to move them
- The more rows are eliminated, the higher the score is.
